metadata.name: bubble wrap
metadata.description:
[i]"Bubbly tears + shot speed up"[/i]
Shot speed + range up.
Gives Isaac one soul heart on pickup.
Tears now linger for a few seconds right after they start to fall to the ground.
Can be found in the Treasure Room pool.
This item is part of the StrawPack item pack.
Code by Strawrat and art by Aczom.
